svg.text: Weeks 15-20: Converting Business Requirements into System Configuration
Estimated Completion: Week 19 (1 week ahead of schedule)
User Roles: 47 users across 6 role types
Waiting for HR approval on role definitions
Process owners struggle to allocate time for documentation
â€¢ Schedule dedicated workshops with each process owner
Estimated completion: 5 weeks (no templates available - building from scratch)
â€¢ Business rule extractions: 89 rules identified
â€¢ Sample size calculations: 23 models created
Based on patterns, suggest implementing automated evidence collection for inventory controls (85% efficiency gain)
â€¢ Stacked layout: Components stack vertically on mobile devices
â€¢ Collapsible sections: Each component can be collapsed/expanded
â€¢ Touch-optimized: Larger buttons and touch targets for mobile interaction
â€¢ Progressive disclosure: Show summary first, drill-down for details
